alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:22AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jasper, southeastern Smith, southeastern Lawrence, Covington, western Jones and southern Jefferson Davis Counties through 1115 AM CST... At 1022 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bay Springs to near Tilton. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bay Springs and Turnerville around 1025 AM CST. Paulding and Carson around 1035 AM CST. Orange and Melba around 1040 AM CST. Sanford around 1055 AM CST. Laurel and Ellisville around 1105 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Seminary, Bassfield, Louin and Soso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for south central, central, southeastern and east central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence; Smith
